overview:
Anita T. Moseley joined Evolving Systems in 1994. Moseley is the chief legal officer for Evolving Systems and oversees legal and regulatory compliance as well as contracting.

Prior to Evolving Systems, Moseley held an in-house corporate counsel position with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation/Resolution Trust Corporation and served as General Counsel for Centera Corporation, a computer hardware reseller. Moseley was a partner in the Salt Lake City law firm of Prince, Yeates and Geldzahler. She holds a B.A. from Syracuse University and a J.D. from the University of Utah.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President and General Counsel
